snippet.title: Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest – Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Get a new look at gameplay in this latest trailer for the upcoming action-adventure game, Little Big Adventure - Twinsen's Quest.

The story takes place on a planetoid with two suns, where four species lived in perfect harmony... Until the day Dr. Funfrock, a brilliant scientist, invented cloning and teleportation, gradually bringing the inhabitants under his total control.

Armed with your mysterious Magic Ball, which becomes more and more powerful as the adventure progresses, only you are capable of overturning the powers that be...

Wishlist on:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2318070/Little_Big_Adventure__Twinsens_Quest/
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/fr/p/twinsens-little-big-adventure-remastered-1c39bb
GOG: https://www.gog.com/fr/game/little_big_adventure_twinsens_quest
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011441
Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/little-big-adventure-twinsens-quest/9N9T1N3CWLH7

📩 Subscribe to the newsletter ➡️ https://www.littlebigadventure.com/
